Group comment open the electronic documents exchange settings
When registering on EDF operator service the company obtains a unique ID. You can get it in your account settings of the EDF operator. ID should consist of 46 characters.

Unique code of the company as a participant of electronic document exchange.
Group comment open the electronic documents exchange settings
Each electronic document exchange participant has a unique ID. By default the parameter value is <TIN_KPP> of the company and can be changed manually.

Specify the company email account to be used to send outgoing electronic documents and to receive incoming ones. It is strongly recommended to use the email account created for the exhcange purpose only.

Shared directory where incoming electronic document directory and outgoing electronic document directory will be created. Incoming electronic document directory will be used to receive incoming ED and outgoing electronic document directory will be used to send outgoing ED.
